page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: {HOUSING}- Most people in this area live in houses but we found some lived in flats ,caravans,cottages, bungalows and farms.The majority of the homes in this area were built in the 1960's, they are semidetached and built of bricks .There seems to be a{majority of{privately owned houses}but there are{many council houses}which are rented by families. {APPLIANCES}- We found out that most things in a home are powered by {ELECTRICITY,}90% of the people own {washing machines,}38% have{computers, 30% own{microwave ovens. {PETS}- Most families keep a pet.{Dogs and{cats}are the most popular and these are kept as family pets. A lot of children have their own pets too these include{fish, hamsters, gerbils, {rabbits,}and{birds}- even a{fox-snake. {
